pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw:
The code checker complains:

```
./gazebo/gui/building/BuildingMaker.cc:168:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]
./gazebo/gui/building/EditorView.cc:57:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]
./gazebo/gui/building/BuildingEditorPalette.cc:347:  Using C-style cast.  Use static_cast<int>(...) instead  [readability/casting] [4]
./gazebo/gui/building/BuildingEditorPalette.cc:349:  Using C-style cast.  Use static_cast<int>(...) instead  [readability/casting] [4]
```
